ai.summary: Drinneevar Loop is a gentle 4.5 km circular hike in the UK, ideal for a relaxed day outdoors. The route features easy terrain, modest elevation, and countryside views, making it suitable for beginners and families.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly well-made paths with grassy meadows and packed earth. Occasional gravel sections and sections that may be muddy after rain. Expect gentle undulations rather than steep climbs; ground can be uneven near gates or stiles.
ai.safety_notes: Wear sturdy footwear with good grip. Check the weather and daylight hours before you go. Stay on the marked path; close gates behind you and watch for livestock. Carry water and a snack. In winter, plan for shorter daylight and potentially slippery ground. Let someone know your plans if hiking solo.
ai.best_seasons: Spring, Summer, and Autumn; winter visits are possible but require extra caution due to mud and reduced daylight.

seo.title: Drinneevar Loop - Easy 4.5 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover Drinneevar Loop, a 4.5 km easy circular hike in the UK. Enjoy gentle terrain, scenic countryside, and practical safety tips for a relaxed outdoor experience.
